text: Biondia is a genus of plant in family Apocynaceae, first described as a genus in 1905.Schlechter, Friedrich Richard Rudolf. 1905. Botanische Jahrbücher für Systematik, Pflanzengeschichte und Pflanzengeographie 36(5, Beibl. 82): 91 in German and Latin The entire genus is endemic to China.Flora of China Vol. 16 Page 223 秦岭藤属 qin ling teng shu Biondia Schlechter, Bot. Jahrb. Syst. 36 (Beibl. 82): 91. 1905. ;Species # Biondia chinensis Schltr. - Gansu, Shaanxi # Biondia crassipes M.G.Gilbert & P.T.Li \- Tibet # Biondia hemsleyana (Warb.) Tsiang \- Sichuan # Biondia henryi (Warb. ex Schltr. & Diels) Tsiang & P.T.Li \- Anhui, Fujian, Jiangxi, Sichuan, Zhejiang # Biondia insignis Tsiang \- Guizhou, Hunan, Sichuan, Tibet, Yunnan # Biondia laxa M.G.Gilbert & P.T.Li \- Yunnan # Biondia longipes P.T.Li \- Sichuan # Biondia microcentra (Tsiang) P.T.Li \- Anhui, Sichuan, Yunnan, Zhejiang # Biondia parviurnula M.G.Gilbert & P.T.Li \- Anhui # Biondia pilosa Tsiang & P.T.Li \- Sichuan, Yunnan # Biondia revoluta M.G.Gilbert & P.T.Li \- Gansu, Tibet, Yunnan # Biondia tsiukowensis M.G.Gilbert & P.T.Li \- Yunnan # Biondia yunnanensis (H.Lév.) Tsiang \- Henan, Sichuan, Yunnan ==References== Category:Endemic flora of China Category:Apocynaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
